markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Catfolk](/Traits.aspx?ID=746)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 315 <sup>1.1</sup>

A creature with this trait is a member of the [catfolk](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=77) ancestry. Catfolk are humanoids with [feline](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=376) features. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by catfolk. An item with this trait is created and used by catfolk.
name: Catfolk
